name: Duck Surf DX
description:
Hold up arrow to not die instantly.

I made this in one day for this game jam:

I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again)

https://itch.io/jam/i-cant-draw-but-want-to-make-a-game-again

I think it's fun for a while, it contains my "programmer art" and even my "programmer music" containing a grand 2 instruments trying to simulate surf rock.
